attributes.title: scary app
attributes.review:
good evening i downloaded this app recommended to me by my grandchildren yet failed to realize this is not a safe place to post selfies of my and my wife. i was very excited to post wonderful pictures of my family but when i opened my phone i had a heart attack when i was greeted by some awkward looking... oompa-loompa sort of creature? roald dahl would be disappointed. my family had to send me to the er and now i am in debt. thanks a lot. 

also america is in a terrible state at the moment and our so-called president hasn‚Äôt done anything so i‚Äôm not sure why it says make america great again.

sincecerely, 
edward
